content: this kitty bed is crocheted while holding two strands of yarn together at the same time so it s extra thick and plushy the finished product measures 24 wide and 3 deep it requires 5 skeins of your favorite acrylic worsted weight yarn i used red heart with love you ll also need a size k crochet hook polyester stuffing seaming pins a stitch marker and a finishing needle the bed base is adapted from http //kandjdolls blogspot com/2014/07/free-rug-crochet-pattern html
